title: Unable to uninstall and reinstall LoL
body: After not playing LoL for a couple of months, I attempted to uninstall then reinstall it because the icons on the taskbar were not working. However, whenever I try to uninstall League, i receive the message that there was an "Error getting file security", GetLastError: 5. I've tried everything I could think of. I deleted all files which contained "riot" and "league" from my pc, downloaded the hextech repair tool, scanned the computers registry, and tried uninstalling through the control panel and other applications. However, none of these worked. Can you help me with a solution? Thanks.

replies.body:
Your OS needs to essentially be given permission to alter certain files on your pc. If it doesn't have those permissions in place, you can sometimes get errors like this when trying to install or uninstall something. 

Look over our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see how you get get those settings in place!
